summary: CONSUMER STATED WHILE DRIVING AT 40MPH THE ENGINE MAKES A SEVERE NOISE AND THEN  A VIBRATION IS FELT AS IF THE ENGINE IS LOOSING POWER, WHICH WAS DUE TO A FAULTY ENGINE COIL PACK THAT WENT BAD. DEALER WAS NOTIFIED AND WILL CHANGE ONLY ONE COIL. DUKE GOLD'S SPEED WAY VOLKSWAGEN DEALER, WILL NOT REPLACE THE COIL AT LEAST IN THE FOLLOWING NEXT 3 WEEKS BECAUSE THERE IS A NATIONAL BACK ORDER. PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.*JB
